title: Tic Tac Go
lookFor: Total X+O values 27x+ bet (add ALL prizes on board) | Avoid full boards or 3-in-a-row (resets next spin) | Consider blocked colors when evaluating prize distribution | Rocket Rollup version: use bet pad amount, not main screen
stopPlaying: After tic-tac-toe game won (3 in a row or draw) and board resets
safePreviewBlurb: Tic Tac Go features a 3x3 reelset with a 3x3 tic-tac-toe board above the reels. Red X‚Äôs and blue O‚Äôs land on the reels and then move up to the...

images.caption: A red X landed in reel three, which won the game for red on the board above. The total value on all of the X‚Äôs was awarded.
Do not play boards like this. Red won on the previous game and the entire board will clear out next spin.
This is a much better play because the total equity here is 28x.
This is an excellent play with both the major and minor jackpots on the board.

playWhen: **Primary Requirement:** - Total X + O values ‚â• 27x bet size - Add ALL prizes on the board **Rocket Rollup Version:** - Use bet pad amount (NOT main screen) - Main screen includes progressive contribution - Example: $0.75 bet pad ‚Üí Entry point = $20.25 (27x) | Setup | Action | |-------|--------| | Total board value ‚â• 27x bet | ‚úÖ **Play** | | Full board (9 filled) | ‚ùå Skip (resets next spin) | | 3 in a row showing | ‚ùå Skip (resets next spin) | ---
stopWhen:
- Tic-tac-toe game won (3 in a row or draw)
- Board resets next spin

---
doNotPlayWhen:
- Full board (all 9 positions filled) - resets next spin
- 3 in a row already showing - resets next spin
- Total value below 27x threshold
- Large values concentrated on blocked/losing color

---
howItWorks:
Tic Tac Go features **a tic-tac-toe board with accumulated prizes**:

**Mechanic:**
- 3x3 reelset with 3x3 tic-tac-toe board above
- Red X's and blue O's land on reels ‚Üí Move to board
- X's/O's contain prizes (1x-10x bet) or jackpots
- 3 in a row ‚Üí Win ALL prizes of that color (not just the row)
- Draw ‚Üí Color with most symbols wins

**Prize Range:**
- Credit prizes: 1x to 10x bet size
- Jackpots: Minor, Major, Mega

---
commonMistakes:
- Playing nearly-full boards (seems good, usually loses)
- Not adding ALL values (both X's and O's)
- Playing when 3 in a row already exists (will reset)
- Using main screen bet amount on Rocket Rollup version
- Ignoring blocked color situations

---
additionalNotes:
**Blocked Colors:**
- Some setups make one color impossible to win
- Don't play if large values are on blocked color
- Play more aggressively if large values guaranteed to win

**Go Symbol:**
- Lands in center of reels
- Awards ALL prizes (both X's and O's) immediately

**Major Jackpot:**
- Appears fairly frequently
- Usually ~50/50 shot of hitting when found

**Spot Mechanics:**
- X's/O's can't land in same spot twice
- Filled board position = Can't land in corresponding reel position

**Free Games:**
- Triggers fairly frequently
- Collected X's/O's do NOT transfer in or out

**Rocket Rollup Version:**
- Play same strategy, ignore progressives
- Small loss percentage, evens out over time

**Free Check Method:**
- Tap menu icon in lower left
- Use up/down arrows to cycle bet levels

**RTP Range:**
- 85% to 96%

title: Top Up Fortunes: Flame / Ocean
lookFor: 8+ yellow squares total (tap Paytable on bet pad if not showing) | 6+ yellow squares in first 3 reels | 3 vertical squares above any reel (Add Wild opportunity) | Only count squares with spins remaining (green counter) | 3 vertical at 0 spins counts as 2
stopPlaying: After free games or hold & spin bonus triggers
safePreviewBlurb: In Top Up Fortunes, landing a volcano/trident symbol in a reel will expand the height of that reel for the next three spins. The reels begin at...

images.caption: Landing a volcano symbol in the fifth reel (which was already max height) triggered the Add Wild feature. Sega Sammy games are known for having massive line hits like this.
The yellow squares represent the expanded reels (you may need to tap the Paytable button on the left if you aren‚Äôt seeing this screen displayed).

playWhen: **Reading Yellow Squares:** - Bet pad shows yellow squares = expanded positions - 3 vertical squares = 6-symbol tall reel (max) - Tap "Paytable" on bet pad if not showing - **CRITICAL:** Only count squares with spins remaining - 3 vertical at 0 spins = counts as 2 **Entry Points:** | Setup | Action | |-------|--------| | 8+ yellow squares total | ‚úÖ **Play** | | 6+ yellow squares in first 3 reels | ‚úÖ **Play** | | 3 vertical squares above any reel | ‚úÖ **Play** (Add Wild opportunity) | ---
stopWhen:
- Free games bonus triggers
- Hold & spin feature triggers

---
doNotPlayWhen:
- Fewer than 8 total squares (without concentrated setups)
- Squares at 0 spins without accounting for drop
- No Add Wild opportunities visible

---
howItWorks:
Top Up Fortunes features **expanding reels with Add Wild opportunity**:

**Game Variants:**
- Top Up Fortunes: Flame (volcano symbols)
- Top Up Fortunes: Ocean (trident symbols)

**Mechanic:**
- Volcano/trident lands ‚Üí Reel expands one level
- Reels: 3 symbols tall ‚Üí max 6 symbols tall
- Green counter shows spins remaining at current height
- After 3 spins ‚Üí Reel drops one level

**Add Wild Feature (Key Hidden Value):**
- Land volcano/trident on MAX height reel
- Adds 2+ wilds to reels 2-5
- Can result in massive line hits
- Resets spin counter back to 3

---
commonMistakes:
- Not knowing about Add Wild feature
- Counting squares at 0 spins as full value
- Not tapping Paytable to see yellow squares
- Missing 3-vertical setups (low cost, huge upside)

---
additionalNotes:
**Add Wild Strategy:**
- Many APs don't know about this feature
- 3 vertical squares = Low cost play + massive potential
- Volcano/trident on max reel = Add Wild + reset to 3 spins

**Multiple Symbols:**
- Multiple volcano/trident can land on same reel
- Each raises reel one level

**Checking Method:**
- Glance at bet pad for yellow squares
- Tap Paytable if not visible
- Denomination buttons broken on bet pad (use main screen)

**Volatility:**
- Free games and hold & spin are feast-or-famine
- Typical Sega Sammy variance

title: TREASURE
lookFor: BLACK background (not green/blue) with any of: 1+ wild/panda/pirate symbol in reels 1-3 | Wild symbol in BOTH reels 4 and 5 | 400+ ways displayed | Treasure chest 1 space from key
stopPlaying: When background turns green (Panda
safePreviewBlurb: (Panda‚Äôs Treasure / Pirate‚Äôs Treasure) Panda‚Äôs Treasure and its companion Pirate‚Äôs Treasure feature treasure chests above each reel. The treasure...

images.caption: Spin 1 of 3: The panda symbol counts as a wild on the spin it lands and will stay as a persistent wild on the next spin (along with the other red wild symbols).
Spin 1 of 5: The pirate symbols will turn into persistent wild symbols on the next spin.
Spin 2 of 5: A cannon symbol landed in the first reel to keep the streak going.
Spin 3 of 5: A pirate symbol landed to continue the streak.
Spin 4 of 5: Another cannon symbol landed to continue the streak. Having taller reels like this gives you more chances to land subsequent symbols to keep the play alive.
Spin 5 of 5: No more cannon or pirate symbols landed, so the play is now dead (notice the blue background). I made a profit of $1,602 on this play (without a W-2G).

playWhen:
**REQUIRED:** Background must be BLACK

**Plus ANY of the following:**

| Setup | Action |
|-------|--------|
| 1+ wild/panda/pirate in reels 1-3 | ‚úÖ **Play** |
| Wild in BOTH reels 4 AND 5 | ‚úÖ **Play** |
| 400+ ways displayed | ‚úÖ **Play** |
| Treasure chest 1 space from key | ‚úÖ **Play** |

---
stopWhen:
- Background turns green (Panda's) or blue (Pirate's)
- State resets next spin

---
doNotPlayWhen:
- Background is GREEN (Panda's) or BLUE (Pirate's) - RESETS
- No wilds/panda/pirate symbols visible
- Below 400 ways without meeting other criteria

---
howItWorks:
Treasure features **persistent wilds with background state indicator**:

**Game Variants:**
- Panda's Treasure (rocket symbols, green background when reset)
- Pirate's Treasure (cannon symbols, blue background when reset)

**Mechanic:**
- Rocket/cannon lands ‚Üí Reel expands one symbol
- Panda/pirate symbols ‚Üí Turn into persistent wilds next spin
- Treasure chests pushed toward keys ‚Üí Win credit prize
- Ways: 243 ‚Üí up to 7,776

**CRITICAL - Background Color:**
| Background | State |
|------------|-------|
| **BLACK** | ‚úÖ State persists next spin |
| **GREEN** (Panda's) | ‚ùå Resets next spin |
| **BLUE** (Pirate's) | ‚ùå Resets next spin |

---
commonMistakes:
- Playing when background is green/blue (everything resets)
- Focusing on treasure chests instead of wilds
- Writing off the game as an AP trap
- Missing frequent black background opportunities

---
additionalNotes:
**Low Cost, High Upside:**
- Plays usually only a few spins investment
- Losses minimal
- Plays are common (black background frequent)

**Symbol Mechanics:**
- Rocket/cannon disappear after every spin
- Only wilds persist (when black background)
- Wilds don't block other symbols (sub-symbol appears in corner)

**Treasure Chests:**
- Only win chest that touches key (not entire stack)
- Reels don't shrink after triggering
- 3-stack chests = Only 1 rocket/cannon needed

**Free Check Method:**
- 6 bet levels + multiple denominations
- Many opportunities to find plays
- No money needed to check

**Description:** Spin 5 of 5: No more cannon or pirate symbols landed, so the play is now dead (notice the blue background). I made a profit of $1,602 on this play (without a W-2G).

## How The Advantage Works

Treasure features **persistent wilds with background state indicator**:

**Game Variants:**
- Panda's Treasure (rocket symbols, green background when reset)
- Pirate's Treasure (cannon symbols, blue background when reset)

**Mechanic:**
- Rocket/cannon lands ‚Üí Reel expands one symbol
- Panda/pirate symbols ‚Üí Turn into persistent wilds next spin
- Treasure chests pushed toward keys ‚Üí Win credit prize
- Ways: 243 ‚Üí up to 7,776

**CRITICAL - Background Color:**
| Background | State |
|------------|-------|
| **BLACK** | ‚úÖ State persists next spin |
| **GREEN** (Panda's) | ‚ùå Resets next spin |
| **BLUE** (Pirate's) | ‚ùå Resets next spin |

---

## ‚ö†Ô∏è THE REAL VALUE

**Many APs skip this game thinking it's a trap.**

The treasure chests are NOT the value - **persistent wilds are**.
- Build up wilds across multiple reels
- Massive line hits possible
- All-ways-pay = No symbol alignment needed
- Streaks of consecutive huge wins

---

## PLAY WHEN

**REQUIRED:** Background must be BLACK

**Plus ANY of the following:**

| Setup | Action |
|-------|--------|
| 1+ wild/panda/pirate in reels 1-3 | ‚úÖ **Play** |
| Wild in BOTH reels 4 AND 5 | ‚úÖ **Play** |
| 400+ ways displayed | ‚úÖ **Play** |
| Treasure chest 1 space from key | ‚úÖ **Play** |

---

## DO NOT PLAY WHEN

- Background is GREEN (Panda's) or BLUE (Pirate's) - RESETS
- No wilds/panda/pirate symbols visible
- Below 400 ways without meeting other criteria

---

## STOP WHEN

- Background turns green (Panda's) or blue (Pirate's)
- State resets next spin

---

## COMMON MISTAKES

- Playing when background is green/blue (everything resets)
- Focusing on treasure chests instead of wilds
- Writing off the game as an AP trap
- Missing frequent black background opportunities

---

## Additional Notes

**Low Cost, High Upside:**
- Plays usually only a few spins investment
- Losses minimal
- Plays are common (black background frequent)

**Symbol Mechanics:**
- Rocket/cannon disappear after every spin
- Only wilds persist (when black background)
- Wilds don't block other symbols (sub-symbol appears in corner)

**Treasure Chests:**
- Only win chest that touches key (not entire stack)
- Reels don't shrink after triggering
- 3-stack chests = Only 1 rocket/cannon needed

**Free Check Method:**
- 6 bet levels + multiple denominations
- Many opportunities to find plays
- No money needed to check

howItWorks: Ultra Rush Gold X features **gold scatter accumulation for bonus trigger**: **Game Variants:** - Ultra Rush Gold X: Bingwen - Ultra Rush Gold X: Wei Yi **Mechanic:** - 5 scatter symbols ‚Üí Bonus triggers - Gold scatter lands ‚Üí Locks for 3 additional spins - Another gold lands ‚Üí Spin count resets to 3 - Only need 5 ANY scatters (gold, blue bubbles, or wheel) **Key Difference from Original:** - "X" version: 5 scatters needed (not 6) ---

additionalNotes:

- Gold scatters lock and persist
- Blue bubbles and wheel symbols also count toward 5
- Gold scatters don't block - symbols behind still evaluated
- Sub-symbol shown at bottom of gold scatter

**Bonus Extension:**
- At 0 spins, game may randomly grant 3 more spins

**Free Check Method:**
- Glance at bet pad to see collected scatters
- Tap buttons on bet pad for other denominations
- 4 denominations = Many opportunities

**RTP Range:**
- 85% to 94%

playWhen: **Simple Method:** - Total prizes above all 5 reels ‚â• 70x bet - Prefer values spread across reels (not concentrated) - Best: Values in reels 2 and 4 (easiest to trigger) - Worst: Values mostly in reel 5 (avoid) **Advanced Method (More Accurate):** - Multiply each reel's value by its weight: - Reel 1 √ó 0.7 - Reel 2 √ó 0.9 - Reel 3 √ó 0.5 - Reel 4 √ó 1.0 - Reel 5 √ó 0.33 - Weighted total ‚â• 45x bet | Method | Threshold | |--------|-----------| | Simple (total prizes) | 70x bet | | Advanced (weighted) | 45x bet | ---

howItWorks:
WOF 4D Collector's Edition features **credit prizes with Collect trigger**:

**Mechanic:**
- Credit prize above each reel
- Coins land ‚Üí Prize above that reel increases

| Reel | Difficulty | Weight |
|------|------------|--------|
| 4 | Easiest | 1.0 |
| 2 | Easy | 0.9 |
| 1 | Medium | 0.7 |
| 3 | Hard | 0.5 |
| 5 | Hardest | 0.33 |

additionalNotes:

- Don't reset after collecting

- Collect symbol can be at bottom of stack

- 88% to 96%

safePreviewBlurb: Wheel of Fortune 4D More Money features multipliers above each reel. Every time a wild symbol lands on a reel, the multiplier above that reel...

images.caption: The 13x yellow multiplier is up next, so I would give this one spin and then stop playing.

playWhen: **Option A ‚Äî Multiple Yellow Multipliers:** - 3+ yellow multipliers (6x or higher) - Total adds up to 24x+ - Examples: 8x+8x+8x=24x ‚úÖ, 6x+6x+12x=24x ‚úÖ **Option B ‚Äî Yellow Up Next:** - Any yellow multiplier has border directly to the left - Play 1 spin only | Setup | Action | |-------|--------| | 3+ yellow totaling 24x+ | ‚úÖ **Play** | | Yellow up next (border to left) | ‚úÖ **1 spin** | | Single yellow, not up next | ‚ùå Skip | ---
stopWhen:
- After triggering one yellow multiplier

---
doNotPlayWhen:
- Single yellow multiplier (even large ones)
- Takes 5 spins to cycle back - not worth the cost
- Multiplier just triggered (will reset)

---
howItWorks:
Wheel of Fortune 4D More Money features **cycling multipliers above reels**:

**Mechanic:**
- Multiplier above each reel (1x to 20x)
- Wild lands ‚Üí Multiplier above that reel increases by 1x
- Active multiplier has border around it
- Border slides RIGHT one space each spin
- After reel 5 ‚Üí Cycles back to reel 1
- After triggering ‚Üí Resets to 1x next spin

**Multiplier Colors:**
| Value | Color |
|-------|-------|
| 1x-5x | Normal |
| 6x+ | **YELLOW** |

---
commonMistakes:
- Chasing single yellow multipliers (too many spins to cycle)
- Not checking if last play was a win (multiplier will reset)
- Playing after triggering (stop after one)

---
additionalNotes:
**Multiplier Application:**
- Active multiplier applies to ALL line wins
- Doesn't need line hit reaching that reel
- Example: Reel 5 multiplier works on 3-reel line hits

**Cycle Length:**
- 5 spins to complete full cycle
- Single yellow not worth the cost to chase

title: Wheel of Fortune Wild Spin
lookFor: Game 9: 1+ frame in first 3 reels | Game 8-7: 2+ frames in same row (first 3 reels) | Game 6-5: 3+ frames in same row (first 4 reels) | Game 4-3: 5+ frames in first 3 reels | 4 frames in same row | Game 2-1: 6+ frames in first 3 reels | 4 frames in same row | Never play Game 10
stopPlaying: After spin 10 completes (all frames turn wild, board resets)
safePreviewBlurb: (Vacation / Night Life) Wheel of Fortune Wild Spin operates on a ten game cycle. All locked gold frames accumulated during the ten game cycle...

images.caption: This walk-up play resulted in a $66 win on a $2 investment. Five-of-a-kind wilds, like on the top two rows, pay very well.

playWhen: **Simplified Rule:** - Lots of frames on the LEFT (reels 1-3) - Preferably connected HORIZONTALLY - Further in cycle = Better **Detailed Thresholds:** | Spin | Frames Needed | Location | |------|---------------|----------| | 10 of 10 | ‚ùå **NEVER** | N/A | | 9 of 10 | 1+ | First 3 reels | | 8-7 of 10 | 2+ same row | First 3 reels | | 6-5 of 10 | 3+ same row | First 4 reels | | 4-3 of 10 | 5+ OR 4 same row | First 3 reels | | 2-1 of 10 | 6+ OR 4 same row | First 3 reels | ---
stopWhen:
- Spin 10 completes (frames turn wild, board resets)

---
doNotPlayWhen:
- Spin 10 of 10 (wilds activate THIS spin, too late)
- Frames not connected horizontally (early in cycle)
- Frames have gaps (wheel bonus blocks line hits)

---
howItWorks: Wheel of Fortune Wild Spin operates on a **10-game cycle with locking frames**: **Game Variants:** - Vacation - Night Life **Mechanic:** - Frames lock during 10 game cycle - Spin 10: ALL locked frames turn wild - Board resets after spin 10 **Key Difference from Scarab:** - More payout in wheel bonus and progressives - Line hits with wilds slightly less lucrative - Wheel bonus can act as line hit blocker ---
commonMistakes:
- Playing spin 10 of 10 (no value left)
- Focusing on 3-of-a-kind setups (pays poorly)
- Not prioritizing horizontal connections
- Missing that wheel bonus can block line hits

---
additionalNotes:
**Spin 9 Opportunity:**
- Almost always worth playing
- Additional frames can land on spin 10 (instantly wild)
- Low-cost +EV play

**Horizontal > Vertical:**
- Frames tend to land in vertical stacks
- Horizontally aligned much better for line hits
- Connected frames better than frames with gaps

**Popular Game:**
- Check frequently - very popular in casinos
- Plays can develop quickly

**Why Mid-Cycle is Valuable:**
- Payout based on full 10-game cycle average
- Starting mid-cycle = Same return, half the cost

title: Wild Explosion: Get‚ÄòCha Gold / Get‚ÄòCha Money / Get‚ÄòCha Reward / Get‚ÄòCha Treasure
lookFor: Red wilds with countdown timer in reels 2 or 3 (any countdown value) | Red wilds in reel 4 with countdown of 2 or 3 (play for chance to land reel 2-3 wild) | Listen for ticking sound indicating active timers
stopPlaying: After all red wild countdowns reach 0 and explode or fizzle (no red wilds remaining)
safePreviewBlurb: Wild Explosion features persistent red wilds that land on the reels with a countdown timer on them set to 3. When the countdown timer on a red...

images.caption: The number next to the red wilds in reels two and four shows how many spins remain before the bomb may explode, releasing up to nine adjacent wilds.
When the red wilds explode and add a bunch of wilds in a horizontal manner like this, you can get huge line hits.
During the free games feature, the red wilds always explode when one reaches 0. Therefore, you can get big wins like this nearly 200x bonus.
You only need to check the bet levels under the Wild Explosion bets on the bet pad.
The older versions of the game have physical buttons on the bet pad, but they play the same.

playWhen:
**Red wilds only under "Wild Explosion" bet levels on bet pad.**

| Red Wild Location | Countdown | Action |
|-------------------|-----------|--------|
| Reels 2 or 3 | Any (1, 2, or 3) | ‚úÖ **Play** |
| Reel 4 | 2 or 3 | ‚úÖ **Play** (chance to land reel 2-3 wild) |
| Reel 4 | 1 | ‚ùå Skip (not enough spins) |

---
stopWhen:
- All red wild countdowns reach 0 and explode or fizzle
- No red wilds remaining

---
doNotPlayWhen:
- No red wilds with countdown timers
- Reel 4 wild with countdown of 1 only
- Only blue wilds visible (not persistent)

---
howItWorks: Wild Explosion features **red wilds with countdown timers that explode**: **Game Variants:** - Get'Cha Gold - Get'Cha Money - Get'Cha Reward - Get'Cha Treasure **Mechanic:** - Red wilds land with countdown timer (starts at 3) - Timer counts down each spin - Timer reaches 0 ‚Üí Usually (not always) explodes - Explosion releases up to 9 wilds around it - One explosion ‚Üí ALL red wilds explode (chain reaction) **Audio Cue:** - Ticking sound = Active countdown timers ---
commonMistakes:
- Playing non-Wild Explosion bet levels (no red wilds)
- Confusing blue wilds with red wilds (blue disappear)
- Not listening for ticking sound
- Expecting consistent explosions (can fizzle)

---
additionalNotes:
**Low Cost, Huge Upside:**
- At most a few spins investment
- 100x and 200x line hits not uncommon
- Multiple horizontal explosions = Massive wins

**Explosion Behavior:**
- Unpredictable - can fizzle instead of explode
- Wilds can spread vertically OR horizontally
- Horizontal spread = Best payouts
- Very volatile

**Symbol Types:**
- Red wilds (countdown) = Persistent
- Blue wilds (no countdown) = Disappear next spin
- Red wilds appear as bombs or dynamite (version dependent)

**Reel Locations:**
- Red countdown wilds only appear in reels 2, 3, or 4
- New red wilds can land on same spin timer reaches 0

**Free Games:**
- Red wilds ALWAYS explode when reaching 0 during bonus
- Can lead to 200x+ payouts

**Cabinet Versions:**
- Old version: Physical buttons on bet pad
- New version: Touchscreen bet pad
- Same strategy for both

Therefore, you can get big wins like this nearly 200x bonus. ### Image 5 ![Wild Explosion: Get'Cha Gold / Get'Cha Money / Get'Cha Reward / Get'Cha Treasure](images/wild-explosion-getcha-gold--getcha-money--getcha-reward--getcha-treasure-5.jpg) **Description:** You only need to check the bet levels under the Wild Explosion bets on the bet pad. ### Image 6 ![Wild Explosion: Get'Cha Gold / Get'Cha Money / Get'Cha Reward / Get'Cha Treasure](images/wild-explosion-getcha-gold--getcha-money--getcha-reward--getcha-treasure-6.jpg) **Description:** The older versions of the game have physical buttons on the bet pad, but they play the same. ## How The Advantage Works Wild Explosion features **red wilds with countdown timers that explode**: **Game Variants:** - Get'Cha Gold - Get'Cha Money - Get'Cha Reward - Get'Cha Treasure **Mechanic:** - Red wilds land with countdown timer (starts at 3) - Timer counts down each spin - Timer reaches 0 ‚Üí Usually (not always) explodes - Explosion releases up to 9 wilds around it - One explosion ‚Üí ALL red wilds explode (chain reaction) **Audio Cue:** - Ticking sound = Active countdown timers --- ## PLAY WHEN **Red wilds only under "Wild Explosion" bet levels on bet pad.** | Red Wild Location | Countdown | Action | |-------------------|-----------|--------| | Reels 2 or 3 | Any (1, 2, or 3) | ‚úÖ **Play** | | Reel 4 | 2 or 3 | ‚úÖ **Play** (chance to land reel 2-3 wild) | | Reel 4 | 1 | ‚ùå Skip (not enough spins) | --- ## DO NOT PLAY WHEN - No red wilds with countdown timers - Reel 4 wild with countdown of 1 only - Only blue wilds visible (not persistent) --- ## STOP WHEN - All red wild countdowns reach 0 and explode or fizzle - No red wilds remaining --- ## COMMON MISTAKES - Playing non-Wild Explosion bet levels (no red wilds) - Confusing blue wilds with red wilds (blue disappear) - Not listening for ticking sound - Expecting consistent explosions (can fizzle) --- ## Additional Notes **Low Cost, Huge Upside:** - At most a few spins investment - 100x and 200x line hits not uncommon - Multiple horizontal explosions = Massive wins **Explosion Behavior:** - Unpredictable - can fizzle instead of explode - Wilds can spread vertically OR horizontally - Horizontal spread = Best payouts - Very volatile **Symbol Types:** - Red wilds (countdown) = Persistent - Blue wilds (no countdown) = Disappear next spin - Red wilds appear as bombs or dynamite (version dependent) **Reel Locations:** - Red countdown wilds only appear in reels 2, 3, or 4 - New red wilds can land on same spin timer reaches 0 **Free Games:** - Red wilds ALWAYS explode when reaching 0 during bonus - Can lead to 200x+ payouts **Cabinet Versions:** - Old version: Physical buttons on bet pad - New version: Touchscreen bet pad - Same strategy for both

howItWorks:
Wild Force features **locked frames that turn wild on Wild Spark**:

**Game Variants:**
- Bison Sunrise
- Midnight Wolf

**Mechanic:**
- Frames lock on reels (glowing borders when connected)
- Spin symbol in middle reel ‚Üí Selector wheel spins
- Wild Spark on wheel ‚Üí Connected frames turn wild
- Only frames connected horizontally/vertically turn wild

**Selector Wheel Options:**
| Result | Effect |
|--------|--------|
| Wild Spark | Triggers wilds on connected frames |
| Up to 10 frames | Adds 3-10 extra locked frames |
| Up to 15 frames | Adds 5-15 extra locked frames |
| Up to 20 frames | Adds 7-20 extra locked frames |
| Mega Reel | Credit prizes, jackpots, or free games |

---
commonMistakes:
- Counting "Wild" frames (they disappear)
- Playing without 5+ connected or 13+ total
- Not prioritizing left-side connections
- Expecting strong line hits (they're weak on this game)

---
additionalNotes:
**Weaker Line Hits:**
- Need many MORE frames vs Star Goddess/Wu Dragon/Zodiac Lion
- Line hits are very weak on this game
- 5 wild payline required for good payout

**"REELS CHANGED" Message:**
- Appears under reel 1 every 3 spins
- Wild Spark becomes more likely each time
- Won't get down very deep before triggering

**Free Games Value:**
- Locked frames carry over into bonus
- Become wild for entire feature
- Extra wilds + multipliers available
- Large frame count = Massive payout potential

**Trigger Requirement:**
- FULL Spin symbol needed in middle reel
- Partial symbols do NOT count

**Easy to Spot:**
- Tall cabinet with huge wheel at top
- Visible from across casino

howItWorks:
Wolf Run Eclipse / Cats Wild Serengeti features **four progressive free games meters** (NOT must-hit-by):

|-------|-------|-----------|---------------------|
| Mini | Blue | 5 | 1 full reel |
| Minor | Purple | 5 | 2 full reels |
| Major | Orange | 5 | 3 full reels |
| Mega | Green | 100 | 3 full reels |

**Mechanic:**
- Free games symbol lands in reel 4 ‚Üí Corresponding meter increases
- Bonus triggered ‚Üí Win accumulated free games
- Completely random when bonus triggers (NOT must-hit-by)

commonMistakes:

title: WU DRAGON / STAR GODDESS
lookFor: 7+ frames in first 4 reels with 5+ in reels 2-3 | 6+ frames in first 4 reels with 3+ connected horizontally | 4+ frames in same row | Only check BOTTOM row bets (Portal Lock feature)
stopPlaying: After fireball hits frame and all frames turn wild (frames disappear next spin)
safePreviewBlurb: Wu Dragon and its companion Star Goddess feature persistent frames that lock onto the reels. One or more fireballs will occasionally shoot down...

images.caption: This is the ideal kind of play you are looking for. You are guaranteed five wilds across on the second row from the top and five-of-a-kind on the bottom row.
Entire rows of wilds pay very well. Even with the bonus symbol blocking me on the bottom row, this was a nice win.
Only check the bottom row bets with the Portal Lock feature. The frames in the top row bets are not persistent‚Äîthey disappear after every spin.
This is an awesome walk-up play I found. It‚Äôs common to find scenarios like this where ploppies play for a while and then give up because the machine isn‚Äôt paying out.

playWhen: **Option A ‚Äî Seven Frames:** - 7+ frames in first four reels - WITH 5+ frames in reels 2-3 **Option B ‚Äî Six Frames + Horizontal:** - 6+ frames in first four reels - WITH 3+ frames connected horizontally **Option C ‚Äî Full Row:** - 4+ frames in same row - (Don't need to be connected) | Frames in R1-4 | Reels 2-3 | Horizontal | Action | |----------------|-----------|------------|--------| | 7+ | 5+ | Any | ‚úÖ **Play** | | 6+ | Any | 3+ | ‚úÖ **Play** | | 4+ same row | Any | N/A | ‚úÖ **Play** | ---
stopWhen:
- Fireball hits frame
- All frames turn wild
- Frames disappear next spin

---
doNotPlayWhen:
- Checking top row bets (frames not persistent)
- Frames concentrated on right side only
- Frames only in reel 1 (can't expand left)
- Fewer than 6 frames with poor distribution

---
howItWorks:
Wu Dragon / Star Goddess features **persistent frames** with fireball mechanic:

**Mechanic:**
- Frames lock onto reels
- Fireball shoots from upper right occasionally
- Fireball hits frame ‚Üí That frame + all other frames turn WILD
- Fireball also turns adjacent symbols wild (3 above, 3 below, 1 each side)
- Frames disappear next spin after triggered

**Goal:** 5-of-a-kind line hits (4-of-a-kind pays poorly, 3-of-a-kind barely pays)

‚ö†Ô∏è **CRITICAL:** Only check **BOTTOM row bets** (Portal Lock feature). Top row frames are NOT persistent.

---
commonMistakes:
- Checking top row bets (frames NOT persistent‚Äîonly Portal Lock)
- Not understanding fireball expansion mechanic
- Expecting 3-of-a-kind or 4-of-a-kind to pay well
- Playing reel 1 heavy boards (fireball can't expand left)

---
additionalNotes:
**Frame Value Hierarchy:**
1. Reels 2-3 (most valuable‚Äîfull expansion room)
2. Middle rows (more expansion room)
3. Reel 4 (some value)
4. Reel 1 (least valuable‚Äîcan't expand left)

**Anti-Vulturing Quirk:**
- Sometimes frames mysteriously disappear when checking
- Playing 1 spin (any bet level) restores them
- Exploit this to find hidden plays

**Fireball Behavior:**
- Lands frequently when frames present
- Multiple fireballs can hit multiple frames
- Cascade of wilds = Biggest wins
- Glowing border animation = Big win incoming

**Game Variants:**
- Wu Dragon ‚úÖ
- Star Goddess ‚úÖ (same strategy)

**Portal Lock:**
- Only bottom row bets have persistent frames
- Top row bet frames disappear every spin

title: Ying Cai Shen
lookFor: Active wild on reel 3 (red banner | 2 coins below) | Active wilds on BOTH reels 4 and 5 | Reel 4 wild with 2 spins remaining + 1 coin in reel 3 (play 1 spin for potential double wild)
stopPlaying: After wild reel(s) expire (banner gone, coins empty)
safePreviewBlurb: Ying Cai Shen features coin holders below reels three, four and five. When a coin holder is filled, that reel will turn wild for the next two spins.

images.caption: Reel three will be wild for two more spins, while reel four will be wild for one more spin.

playWhen: **Option A ‚Äî Reel 3 Active:** - Reel 3 has active wild - (2 coins below OR 1 coin + red banner) **Option B ‚Äî Reels 4 AND 5 Active:** - **Both** reels 4 and 5 have active wilds **Option C ‚Äî One-Spin Gamble:** - Reel 4 active with 2 spins remaining - AND 1 coin below reel 3 - Play **1 spin only** to try landing 2nd coin in reel 3 - If no coin lands ‚Üí Stop immediately ---
stopWhen:
- Wild reel(s) expire (banner gone, coins empty)
- One-spin gamble failed (no coin landed in reel 3)

---
doNotPlayWhen:
- Reel 4 or 5 active alone (not both)
- Only 1 coin in reels 3 and 4 (not +EV)
- Active wild about to expire with no coins below

---
howItWorks: Ying Cai Shen features **coin holders** below reels 3, 4, and 5 only: **Mechanic:** - Coins land below reels 3, 4, 5 - 2 coins fills holder ‚Üí Reel turns WILD for 2 spins - Wild reel shows red banner when active **Active Wild Indicators:** | State | Coins Below | Banner | Spins Left | |-------|-------------|--------|------------| | Not active | 0-1 | No | 0 | | Active (2 spins) | 2 | Yes (red) | 2 | | Active (1 spin) | 1 | Yes (red) | 1 | ---
commonMistakes:
- Playing 1 coin in reels 3 and 4 (not +EV)
- Playing single active wild in reel 4 or 5
- Not recognizing active wild indicators (banner + coins)
- Not checking all denominations

---
additionalNotes:
**Limited Advantage:**
- Only reels 3-4-5 have coin holders
- Less valuable than Golden Egypt (all 5 reels)

**Coin Frequency:**
- Coins land frequently
- Common to find active wilds left behind

**Big Wins:**
- 5-of-a-kind main character = Huge payout
- Bonus feature: Frequent but volatile

**Denominations:**
- Multiple denominations available
- Switch directly on bet pad to check all

title: ZODIAC LION / ZODIAC DRAGON
lookFor: 4+ gold frames connected horizontally spanning reels 1-4 or 2-5 | 3+ horizontal frames starting in reel 1 or 2 with 8+ total connected | Avoid frames only in reels 3-4-5 with no connection to reels 1-2 | Check for Lion Spin Bonus leftovers (lion heads become frames next spin)
stopPlaying: After lion/dragon head lands in a gold frame (all connected frames turn wild, then disappear next spin)
safePreviewBlurb: Zodiac Lion and its lesser-known clone, Zodiac Dragon, feature persistent gold frames that lock on the reels. Landing a lion head symbol (or...

images.caption: Attempting to connect gold frames on the left side to gold frames on the right side is risky. Scroll down to see the results of this attempt.
I would definitely still play this, but having holes in the middle like this really cut into the payout.
I considered playing this but decided to pass. If there was one more gold frame connecting horizontally on either the top or bottom clump, then I would play.
Avoid plays like this where the gold frames are concentrated in reels three, four and five.
Watch for plays like this that are the result of the previous player cashing out after the Lion Spin Bonus. Scroll down to see what the next spin will look like.
The leftover lion heads from the Lion Spin Bonus are now gold frames.
Zodiac Dragon isn‚Äôt nearly as common as Zodiac Lion, but it plays exactly the same.

playWhen: **Option A ‚Äî Four Horizontal Frames:** - 4+ gold frames connected horizontally - Must span reels 1-4 OR reels 2-5 **Option B ‚Äî Three Horizontal + Large Clump:** - 3+ horizontal frames starting in reel 1 or 2 - 8+ total connected frames in that clump | Horizontal Span | Total Clump | Action | |-----------------|-------------|--------| | Reels 1-4 | Any | ‚úÖ **Play** | | Reels 2-5 | Any | ‚úÖ **Play** | | Reels 1-3 or 2-4 | 8+ | ‚úÖ **Play** | | Reels 3-5 only | Any | ‚ùå Skip | ---
stopWhen:
- Lion/dragon head lands in gold frame
- All connected frames turn wild
- Frames disappear next spin

---
doNotPlayWhen:
- Frames only in reels 3-4-5 (no connection to reels 1-2)
- Frames connected vertically but not horizontally
- Random scattered frames not connected horizontally

---
howItWorks:
Zodiac Lion / Zodiac Dragon features **persistent gold frames**:

**Mechanic:**
- Lion/dragon head lands ‚Üí Creates gold frame
- Another head lands IN any frame ‚Üí All connected frames turn WILD
- Frames disappear next spin after triggered
- Goal: 4-of-a-kind or 5-of-a-kind line hits (3-of-a-kind pays poorly)

---
commonMistakes:
- Playing any bunch of frames regardless of position (common mistake)
- Playing reels 3-4-5 clumps with no connection to left reels
- Expecting 3-of-a-kind to pay well (need 4+ of a kind)
- Not recognizing horizontal vs vertical connections matter

---
additionalNotes:
**Popular But Poorly Played:**
- One of most popular AP games
- Most hustlers play incorrectly (any frames = play)
- Horizontal connection matters more than frame count

**Lion Spin Bonus Leftovers:**
- After Lion Spin Bonus ‚Üí Leftover lion heads become frames next spin
- Watch for players cashing out after bonus
- These can be excellent walk-up plays

**Bet Level Strategy:**
- Top row bets (no Zodiac Wheel): Pay better but harder to land heads
- Bottom row bets: Take more chances connecting clumps (wheel can help)
- Even $0.60 bet pays well on 5-of-a-kind wilds

**Game Variants:**
- Zodiac Lion ‚úÖ (common)
- Zodiac Dragon ‚úÖ (plays exactly the same, less common)

**Pro Tip:** Turn down volume before checking

**RTP:** 85% to 96%
